AT.name: Thomas Was Alone
AT.description: Thomas Was Alone ist das gefeierte Plattformspiel über die Freundschaft und das Springen. Führe eine Gruppe fühlender Rechtecke durch verschiedene Welten, in denen ihre Fähigkeiten kombiniert werden müssen, um alle Levels zu beenden. Lausche der wunderbaren Musik von David Housden, umgehe Hindernisse, die sorgfältig von Mike Bithell gesetzt wurden und tauche mit Hilfe der von Danny Wallace sehnsüchtig und amüsant gelesenen Erzählung in die Reise der Charaktere ein. Entdecke die Geschichte der ersten fühlenden KIs. Ihre Zusammenarbeit, um zu ... "fliehen". Ein starkes Wort, "erscheinen" wäre besser. "Erscheinen" klingt bedeutungsvoll und verhüllt Wendungen und Ursprünge in der Geschichte. Wir haben auch nicht das Hüpfen erwähnt. Das wäre zu viel. Features: 120 Levels. 15 spielbare Charaktere mit einzigartigen Eigenschaften und Fähigkeiten. Gelesen von Danny Wallace. Soundtrack vom anerkannten Komponisten David Housden. Levelkommentar vom Entwickler Mike Bithell.

AU.name: Thomas Was Alone
AU.description: Thomas Was Alone is the critically acclaimed indie platformer about friendship and jumping. Guide a group of sentient rectangles through a series of environments, combining their skills to reach the end of each level. Listen to awesome music by David Housden, negotiate obstacles meticulously placed by Mike Bithell and immerse yourself in the characters' journey with a voiceover read wistfully and amusingly by Danny Wallace. Discover the story of the world's first sentient AIs, and how they worked together to, well... "escape" is a strong word. "Emerge" might be better. "Emerge" has an air of importance about it, while keeping a plethora of plot twists and origin stories under wraps. We didn't even mention the bouncing. That'd be overkill. Features: 120 levels. 15 playable characters, each with unique characteristics and abilities. Story narrated by Danny Wallace. Soundtrack by critically acclaimed composer David Housden. Commentary for every level by creator Mike Bithell.

BG.name: Thomas Was Alone
BG.description: Thomas Was Alone is the critically acclaimed indie platformer about friendship and jumping. Guide a group of sentient rectangles through a series of environments, combining their skills to reach the end of each level. Discover the story of the world's first sentient AIs, and how they worked together to, well... "escape" is a strong word. "Emerge" might be better. "Emerge" has an air of importance about it, while keeping a plethora of plot twists and origin stories under wraps. We didn't even mention the bouncing. That'd be overkill. Features: 120 levels. 15 playable characters, each with unique characteristics and abilities. Story narrated by Danny Wallace. Soundtrack by critically acclaimed composer David Housden. Commentary for every level by creator Mike Bithell.

BE.name: Thomas Was Alone
BE.description: Thomas Was Alone est le jeu de plateforme indépendant acclamé par la critique reposant sur l'amitié et sur votre habileté à sauter. Guidez un groupe de rectangles animés à travers plusieurs environnements et combinez leurs capacités pour atteindre la fin des niveaux. Vibrez sur la musique de David Housden, évitez les obstacles minutieusement placés par Mike Bithell et plongez dans l'aventure grâce au commentaire de Danny Wallace. Découvrez l'histoire des 1ères formes d'IA conscientes, et les efforts qu'ils déploient pour... "s'échapper". Enfin, disons plutôt "émerger". Oui, "émerger" est plus précis, sans rien dévoiler de l'intrigue ni des origines de l'histoire. Et je ne parle même pas des rebondissements !... Caractéristiques : 120 niveaux. 15 personnages jouables aux capacités spécifiques et uniques. Histoire narrée par Danny Wallace. Bande originale du compositeur David Housden. Commentaires des niveaux par le créateur, Mike Bithell.

ES.name: Thomas Was Alone
ES.description: Thomas Was Alone es un aclamado juego independiente de plataformas acerca de amistad y saltos. Guía a un grupo de rectángulos a través de varios escenarios, combinando sus habilidades para alcanzar el final de cada nivel. Una increíble música compuesta por David Housden, sortea los obstáculos creados por Mike Bithell y sumérgete en un viaje narrado por Danny Wallace. Descubre la historia de las primeras formas de vida artificial, y como trabajan en equipo para, bueno..."escapar" es una palabra fuerte. "Emerger" podría ser más adecuada. "Emerger" tiene un aire de importancia al respecto, mientras se mantiene una gran cantidad de giros en la trama e historias secretas. Sin mencionar el rebote. Eso sería un exceso. Incluye: 120 niveles. 15 personajes con características y habilidades únicas. Historia narrada por Danny Wallace. Una banda sonora compuesta por el aclamado compositor David Housden. Comentarios del creador Mike Bithell en cada nivel.

IT.name: Thomas Was Alone
IT.description: Thomas Was Alone è un famoso gioco indie a piattaforme sull'amicizia e... i salti. Guida un gruppo di rettangoli senzienti attraverso una serie di ambienti, combinando le loro abilità per raggiungere la fine di ogni livello. Ascolta la fantastica musica di David Housden, supera ostacoli posizionati scrupolosamente da Mike Bithell, e immergiti nel viaggio dei personaggi commentato con passione e leggiadria da Danny Wallace. Scopri la storia delle prime IA senzienti al mondo e di come hanno collaborato tra di loro per... beh... "scappare" è una parola un po' forte... meglio dire "emergere". "Emergere" ha un tono più solenne e mantiene celata una pletora di colpi di scena e antefatti. Per non parlare dei rimbalzi. Sarebbe eccessivo. Caratteristiche: 120 livelli 15 personaggi giocabili, ognuno con proprietà e abilità uniche la storia è narrata da Danny Wallace musiche del compositore di successo David Housden ogni livello è commentato dall'ideatore Mike Bithell.

NL.name: Thomas Was Alone
NL.description: Thomas Was Alone is het succesvolle platformspel over vriendschap en springen. Loods een groep misvormde rechthoeken door verschillende omgevingen waarbij je hun vaardigheden gebruikt om het einde van elk level te halen. Luister naar de geweldige muziek van David Housden, ga de obstakels van Mike Bithell uit de weg en geniet van de grappige vertelstem van Danny Wallace. Ontdek het verhaal van 's werelds eerste misbaksels en hoe ze samenwerkten om, tja... "ontsnappen" is misschien iets te sterk, "ontkomen" is wellicht een beter woord. "Ontkomen" heeft iets belangrijks terwijl er gelijkertijd niets over de vele wendingen en achtergrond van het verhaal prijs wordt gegeven. En dan hebben we het nog niets eens over het gestuiter gehad. Dat zou teveel van het goede zijn. Kenmerken: 120 levels. 15 speelbare personages, elk met unieke eigenschappen. Het verhaal wordt verteld door Danny Wallace. Soundtrack van de succesvolle componist David Housden. Commentaar van maker Mike Bithell.

NZ.name: Thomas Was Alone
NZ.description: Thomas Was Alone is the critically acclaimed indie platformer about friendship and jumping. Guide a group of sentient rectangles through a series of environments, combining their skills to reach the end of each level. PT.name: Thomas Was Alone
PT.description: Thomas Was Alone é o jogo de plataformas independente aclamado pela crítica, sobre amizade e saltos. Acompanha um grupo de retângulos inteligentes ao longo de uma série de ambientes, combinando as suas capacidades para atingir o fim de cada nível. Ouve a música incrível de David Housden, contorna obstáculos colocados por Mike Bithell e envolve-te no percurso das personagens com uma narração apaixonada e divertida por Danny Wallace. Descobre as primeiras IAs inteligentes do mundo e de como trabalharam em conjunto para, enfim... "fugir" é uma palavra muito forte. "Emergir" talvez seja melhor. "Emergir" dá um ar importante, mantendo uma enorme variedade de reviravoltas e origens envoltas em mistério. Nem sequer falámos nos ressaltos. Isso era demais. Características: 120 níveis. 15 personagens com capacidades e habilidades próprias. História narrada por Danny Wallace. Banda sonora do compositor famoso David Housden. Comentários a cada nível pelo criador Mike Bithell.

RU.name: Thomas Was Alone
RU.description: Thomas Was Alone — это признанный многими критиками платформер о дружбе и прыжках, в котором вам предстоит помочь группе разумных прямоугольников. Слушайте чудесную музыку, проходите препятствия и с головой погрузитесь в путешествие своих персонажей. Откройте для себя историю о первых в мире разумных прямоугольниках. Характеристики: 120 уровней. 15 играбельных персонажей. Историю рассказывает Дэнни Уоллес. Звуковая дорожка от Дэвида Хаусдена. Комментарии к уровням от Майка Бителла.

Guide a group of sentient rectangles through a series of environments, combining their skills to reach the end of each level. Listen to awesome music by David Housden, negotiate obstacles meticulously placed by Mike Bithell and immerse yourself in the characters' journey with a voiceover read wistfully and amusingly by Danny Wallace. Discover the story of the world's first sentient AIs, and how they worked together to, well... "escape" is a strong word. "Emerge" might be better. "Emerge" has an air of importance about it, while keeping a plethora of plot twists and origin stories under wraps. We didn't even mention the bouncing. That'd be overkill. Features: 120 levels. 15 playable characters, each with unique characteristics and abilities. Story narrated by Danny Wallace. Soundtrack by critically acclaimed composer David Housden. Commentary for every level by creator Mike Bithell.
